bill_title: authorize the Department of the Military to construct a storage building located in Brown County, to make an appropriation therefor, and to declare an emergency.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to authorize the Department of the Military to construct a storage building located in Brown County, to make an appropriation therefor, and to declare an emergency. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. The Department of the Military, South Dakota Army National Guard, may contract for the construction, completion, furnishing, equipping, and maintaining of, including heating, plumbing, water, sewer, electric facilities, architectural and engineering services, and any other services or actions required to construct a cold storage building in Brown County. Section 2. There is hereby appropriated from the general fund the sum of one hundred twenty-five thousand dollars ($125,000), or so much thereof as may be necessary, and the sum of three hundred seventy-five thousand dollars ($375,000) in federal fund expenditure authority, or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the Army National Guard, to construct the facility described in section 1 of this Act. Section 3. The secretary of the Department of the Military shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 4. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated shall revert in accordance with the procedures prescribed in chapter 4-8. Section 5. Whereas, this Act is necessary for the support of the state government and its existing public institutions, an emergency is hereby declared to exist, and this Act shall be in full force and effect from and after its passage and approval.

ENTITLED An Act to authorize the Department of the Military to construct a storage building located in Brown County, to make an appropriation therefor, and to declare an emergency. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. The Department of the Military, South Dakota Army National Guard, may contract for the construction, completion, furnishing, equipping, and maintaining of, including heating, plumbing, water, sewer, electric facilities, architectural and engineering services, and any other services or actions required to construct a cold storage building in Brown County. Section 2. There is hereby appropriated from the general fund the sum of one hundred twenty-five thousand dollars ($125,000), or so much thereof as may be necessary, and the sum of three hundred seventy-five thousand dollars ($375,000) in federal fund expenditure authority, or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the Army National Guard, to construct the facility described in section 1 of this Act. Section 3. The secretary of the Department of the Military shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 4. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated shall revert in accordance with the procedures prescribed in chapter 4-8. Section 5. Whereas, this Act is necessary for the support of the state government and its existing public institutions, an emergency is hereby declared to exist, and this Act shall be in full force and effect from and after its passage and approval. An Act to authorize the Department of the Military to construct a storage building located in Brown County, to make an appropriation therefor, and to declare an emergency.
